name: Globus
tagline: We do amazing apps for startups and market leaders
description:
Globus was founded with the desired goal of delivering excellent products and services, noting the importance of timelines but most importantly, strictly adhering to project defined budgets.  The Globus team brings a wealth of collaborative experience with both established and start-up companies. In reference to our extensive platform experiences, we have excellent competency with iOS / Android development. Our renowned experience also extends to php/JS/html service. 
Service Offerings:
Prototyping & Concept Development
Frontend and Backend
Product Design
Mobile Development 
Web App Development 
Quality Assurance & Testing
Service support
Outsourcing
